    Deprecated API

    Contents

    • Terminally Deprecated
    • Interfaces
    • Methods
    • Terminally Deprecated Elements
      Element
      Description
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.build()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.major()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.minor()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.contentType()
      use HttpRequestResponse.request() contentType instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.statusCode()
      use HttpRequestResponse.response() statusCode instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.url()
      use HttpRequestResponse.request() url instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.host()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.httpServiceString()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.method()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() method instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.path()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() path instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.port()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.requestBody()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() body instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.requestHttpVersion()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpVersion instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.secure()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.url()
    • Deprecated Interfaces
      Interface
      Description
      burp.api.montoya.scanner.ScanCheck
      New scan checks should instead implement ActiveScanCheck or PassiveScanCheck.
    • Deprecated Methods
      Method
      Description
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.build()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.major()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.core.Version.minor()
      use Version.toString() or Version.buildNumber() instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.contentType()
      use HttpRequestResponse.request() contentType instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.statusCode()
      use HttpRequestResponse.response() statusCode instead.
      burp.api.montoya.http.message.HttpRequestResponse.url()
      use HttpRequestResponse.request() url instead.
      burp.api.montoya.logging.Logging.error()
      Use Logging.logToError(java.lang.String) instead.
      burp.api.montoya.logging.Logging.output()
      Use Logging.logToOutput(java.lang.String) instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.host()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.httpServiceString()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.method()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() method instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.path()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() path instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.port()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.requestBody()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() body instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.requestHttpVersion()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpVersion instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.secure()
      use ProxyHttpRequestResponse.finalRequest() httpService instead.
      burp.api.montoya.proxy.ProxyHttpRequestResponse.url()
      burp.api.montoya.scanner.Scanner.registerScanCheck(ScanCheck)
      This method has been superseded by Scanner.registerActiveScanCheck(ActiveScanCheck, ScanCheckType) and Scanner.registerPassiveScanCheck(PassiveScanCheck, ScanCheckType).
      burp.api.montoya.ui.contextmenu.ContextMenuEvent.selectedIssues()
      Use ContextMenuItemsProvider.provideMenuItems(AuditIssueContextMenuEvent) instead.
